ai-patthana16.33:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.33:0.3_0: There is a cause of reason for this.
ai-patthana16.33:1.1_0: By seeing, you should give up causes and conditions that should be given up. For the sake of seeing.
ai-patthana16.33:1.1_3: neither the threshed nor the sixteen.
ai-patthana16.33:2.1_0: Not seeing, you should give up cause or condition for the sake of seeing.
